>Hijikata, Okita, source �O�Y, and Saito.

This says that April 16, 1863, Yamanami, Saitou, Nagakura, and Okita went to
the Kyoto Shogoshoku/Aizu headquarters at Kurotani (Konkomyoji Temple) and
demonstrated their kenjutsu before Lord Matsudaira.

Then, Inoue Matsugorou, Genzaburou's older brother, came to visit on April
17th and talked with Hijikata, Okita, Genzaburou, and Saitou about Kondou's
"pride" (being too full of himself).



--M.

messages.subject: Yamanami (Sannan) and Saitou
messages.msgSnippet: At http://hajime3.hp.infoseek.co.jp/index.html there is a poster who is interested in historicaly Yamanami Keisuke (Sannan) and he or she posted a question as
messages.messageBody:
At http://hajime3.hp.infoseek.co.jp/index.html there is a poster who
is interested in historicaly Yamanami Keisuke (Sannan) and he or she
posted a question as to whether or not Yamanami and Saitou
interacted with one another.

[this question and answer was posted on the board which deals with
history]

*nifty translations....

The record to which Sannan and Saito acted together is a reference
top.
Fumihisa April 16, 3 and the mansion of the Kyoto protection job of
Kurodani -- the Matsudaira eÛ -- the public Omae game --
participation (Saito vs Nagakura, Sannan vs Okita)

Consult with on the affair of Kondo's pride Inoue pine Goro (elder
brother of source OY) who visited this April 17 and Mibu with
Hijikata, Okita, source OY, and Saito.

There is a more extended explanation at...
http://hajime3.hp.infoseek.co.jp/cgi-bin/patio/patio.cgi?
mode=view&no=4
